name: The Crazy Santa - Free
description:
This app is fully loaded with levels, fun and of course a great gameplay!
The new no. 1 top app from the USA!
Beat the high scores and challenge yourself!

Slide your way through this photo labyrinth! It s a crazy maze. Only you will find the right order. Different personal difficulties. A relaxing puzzle, not only for enthusiasts.
Yes, it is Free!
